name: Quest for the Dragon Sword
description:
Quest for the Dragon Sword is a game I started ages ago using RPG Maker VX Ace, after wanting to get back into making games with RPG Maker, I upgraded to MV and decided to finally finish this project, and to live stream the whole process! This is the first demo version and includes the first dungeon of the game. More will come, to follow development updates, check me out at twitch.tv/tsumi1717!

Hope you enjoy!
